snippet: The School of Life, a new Picador series, includes self-help books by Alain de Botton and Philippa Perry.
abstract: Dwight Garner reviews two books in series entitled The School of Life, Philippa Perry's How to Stay Sane and Alain de Botton's book How to Think More About Sex.
lead_paragraph: The School of Life, a new Picador series, includes self-help books by Alain de Botton and Philippa Perry.

headline.seo: Alain de Botton on Sex, and Philippa Perry on Sanity
headline.main: A Nerdy-Dirty Primer on Primal Urges
headline.print_headline: A Nerdy-Dirty Primer on Primal Urges
